title: Special topic for 8th sem
content:
Now that it's time to register for special topic for 8th sem, this question is for the graduates. Here are the following courses being offered : 

1.  Next-Gen Wireless Networks: Standards, Technologies and 5G
2. Ethical Hacking
3. Design of IOT Solutions
4. Macro and Micro Principles of Economics (MOOC Course)
5. Reinforcement Learning (MOOC Course)
6. Software Testing (MOOC Course)

So how would you recommend each course on a scale of 1-10 ? Any course to avoid?

comments.body: Ah man they made Software Testing a MOOC course. That used to be the easiest Sem 8 special topic by far
How would you compare MOOC course with department one?

I never took one, but some of my classmates did. Some of those IIT/IISC MOOC courses were not good and had fuckall professors giving really difficult assignments and exams.

Itâ€™s quite variable. Department courses in the final sem are generally pretty peaceful, atleast from my experience.

I wouldn't recommend the MOOC courses. PES is known to even change the syllabus for some of these courses claiming the original syllabus isn't enough. It's more of a hassle than convenience. The remaining reasons have already been listed by the other commenter.
Hey, where did u get the list from? do u mind sharing drive link?
